Name: Sundowner #2
Ingredients: 22.5 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur
45 ml Southern/Louisiana-style whisky liqueur (e.g. Southern Comfort)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Review: Subtle meld of summer and citrus flavours.
History: Adapted from a cocktail created in 2002 by Gary Regis at Bed Bar, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Sundowner #2 contains 216 calories
